import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' const root = document.getElementById('root') // cut to new file import { GlobalStyles } from './GlobalStyles' import { Header, Footer, Viewer } from './components' import ourImage from './uclinventorygif.gif' const App = () => { const [quote, setQuote] = useState('') useEffect(() => { fetch(`https://api.britney.rest`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setQuote(data) }) }, []) return ( <>
Joshua Cooper "{quote}"" - Britney Spears

Projects

Caf√© Inventory Web App

The primary use is for reporting daily inventory numbers for a local cafe. The goal of this app is to help expedite a 10-15 minute process into 5 minutes or less. The program will automatically update the inventory required based off of the time and/or the day of the week. Different lists can be rendered by vendor, by day, or time of day.
) } ReactDOM.render(, root)
